EmailTemplate.name: Low TIDs
EmailTemplate.subject: {!TID_Tracker__c.Type__c} TIDs Running Low
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The available Terminal IDs for {!TID_Tracker__c.Type__c} are almost out. Currently there are {!TID_Tracker__c.TIDs_Remaining__c} remaining.
Please get a new range of Terminal IDs and supply them to the Salesforce administrator.
